channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Spark
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Spark

item.title: CVE-2019-10099|2024-08-04T22:10:09.549Z -- apache -- apache%20spark
item.description: Prior to Spark 2.3.3, in certain situations Spark would write user data to local disk unencrypted, even if spark.io.encryption.enabled=true. This includes cached blocks that are fetched to disk (controlled by spark.maxRemoteBlockSizeFetchToMem); in SparkR, using parallelize; in Pyspark, using broadcast and parallelize; and use of python udfs.
